output.sentences: The new 3-D sign on the wall looks amazing.
Brady Quinn dressed up like a hot dog for the art exhibit.
There's a lot of nice artwork here at the gallery.
Brady's favorite fan fabricated a very colorful skull.
The murals on the wall stole the show at this year's exhibit.
